name: Shooting Evil
description: In the world everything was peace and tranquility with a totally regular life, with problems of a normal person, until the news reported that it would be a great step for humanity or so we thought, since the State X company was working on humanoid robots that would help us perform difficult and risky tasks for humans. What we didn't know was the chaos this would bring; the robots went out of control locking up and kidnapping many humans, of which some could not survive. Without a doubt, they must be stopped as soon as possible before humanity disappear!
